TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CheckBoxDesigner extends System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner

Docs.summary: Extends design-time behavior for the Web server control.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The CheckBoxDesigner class overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.CheckBoxDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class to ensure that the control is displayed with a meaningful representation at design time. If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.Text%2A> property is empty, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.CheckBoxDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method of this class sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.Text%2A> property of the control to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the control.
## Examples The following code example creates a custom designer class, named `SampleCheckBoxDesigner`, that inherits from the CheckBoxDesigner class. It overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.CheckBoxDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method. If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property has not been set previously, a call to this method sets it to a string and displays that string on the design surface. If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.Text%2A> property has been set, the existing property value is displayed.
[!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls_CheckBoxDesignerSamples#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.web.ui.design.w_21_1.vb)]
The following code example is a simple class, named `SampleCheckBox`, that inherits from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox> class and is associated with the `SampleCheckBoxDesigner` class by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DesignerAttribute> class.

## Remarks If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.Text%2A> property is empty or consists only of white space, then the generated HTML contains the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> of the check box control; otherwise, the generated HTML contains the contents of the control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.Text%2A> property.
Override this method to change the generated HTML.
## Examples The following code example overrides the GetDesignTimeHtml method. If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property has not been set previously, a call to this method sets it to a string and displays that string on the design surface. If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.Text%2A> property has already been set, the existing property value is displayed.
[!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls_CheckBoxDesignerSamples#2](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/m-system.web.ui.design.w_4_1.vb)]
